entries.title: Your apps and Windows devices could be facing a whole new kind of threat
entries.description: What if fake apps aren't recognized as such - but rather as legitimate products?

entries.title: League of Legends source code auctioned off by hackers
entries.description: Seven-figure sum sought in exchange for LoL and Packman source codes.

entries.title: Samsung morphs the Odyssey Neo G7 into its first flatscreen mini-LED display
entries.description: Similar to the original model, the new 43-inch Samsung Odyssey Neo G7 sports 4K resolutions but also addresses glare.

entries.title: Microsoft is making a big push into solar energy
entries.description: Plans to be powered by renewable energy by 2030 have seen Microsoft go in big on solar energy.

entries.title: Razer Edge gaming handheld finally launches in both 5G and WiFi flavors
entries.description: Razer released its Steam Deck competitor, the Razer Edge, and it comes in both WiFi and 5G versions.

entries.title: The Marvel movies timeline is about get much easier to follow
entries.description: A new Marvel Studios book will finally shed light on where each film and TV show fits on the complicated MCU timeline.

entries.title: Kinsta and Liquid Web branded the most reliable hosts as WordPress turns 20
entries.description: Just in time for WordPress' 20th anniversary, StatusGator names the top seven most reliable WordPress hosting services.

entries.title: Top stock photo site gets AI image generator
entries.description: Shutterstock launches new OpenAI-powered AI image generator.

entries.title: You can now see exactly when you were mentioned in a Microsoft Teams call
entries.description: If your ears are burning, Microsoft Teams can show you why.

entries.title: Why now might be the best time to switch password managers
entries.description: If you're looking for a change in security supplier, now could be a great time for a refresh.

entries.title: The new Minecraft game absolutely nails what's special about the original
entries.description: Mojang has come out swinging with a new PvP mode for Minecraft Legends, and it looks to be the best of both worlds.

entries.title: This Mass Effect 3 mod readds cut content to add new emotional gut punches
entries.description: Two modders have released an unofficial patch for Mass Effect 3 which adds all sorts of extra goodies to the sci-fi RPG.

entries.title: Yamaha's new wireless earbuds bring aptX Adaptive Hi-Res sound for cheap
entries.description: Yamaha's new TW-E3C wireless earbuds will use the brand's expertise and aptX Adaptive Hi-Res sound to deliver a great performance.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 could be the toughest mainstream phone yet
entries.description: Corning has confirmed that the next flagship Samsung phones will be the first to use Gorilla Glass Victus 2.

entries.title: PlayStation Plus may start adding a brilliant feature to its games
entries.description: Sony could add a new feature to retro PlayStation Plus games thanks to Super Stardust Portable.

entries.title: New cyberattacks are being launched every minute
entries.description: BlackBerry report claims the US and Windows users are most targeted - but macOS users are not immune.

entries.title: GoldenEye 007 comes to Nintendo Switch with game-changing new mode
entries.description: Iconic Nintendo 64 title GoldenEye 007 is about to get a new life on Nintendo Switch, complete with a brand new feature.

entries.title: We now know why the DualSense Edge's battery life is so poor
entries.description: A teardown of the DualSense Edge has shown exactly why its battery life is worse off than its base model counterpart.

entries.title: Netflix's streaming dominance laid bare in fascinating new data
entries.description: Despite a turbulent 2022, Netflix continues to reign supreme, according to the latest data.

entries.title: Thanks to the PS5 controller, you really feel the dismemberment in Dead Space
entries.description: The Dead Space remake is right around the corner, and Sony has detailed how the game uses the PS5 hardware.

entries.title: These Russian and Iranian hackers are fooling vital industries
entries.description: National Cyber Security Centre details the very devious tactics used to compromise high-level targets.

entries.title: US government agencies are falling victim to some very obvious attacks
entries.description: Crooks are using legitimate software to steal money from US government agencies and employees.

entries.title: Apple slashes iPhone trade-in prices – here's where to sell your phone instead
entries.description: Apple has just cut the trade-in prices on many of its iPhones – here's where to sell your old phone instead.

entries.title: OpenCore lets you install macOS Ventura on unsupported Macs - but please don't
entries.description: If you've been wanting to try out Ventura on a 2013 Mac Pro, here's your chance - but is there a point?

entries.title: Delaying this multiplayer take on The Last of Us is a good thing
entries.description: After complications with copyrighting, The Day Before has been delayed until the end of the year.

entries.title: Flexible working is now more important than holidays for new jobseekers
entries.description: Flexibility is of growing interest to workers in Europe, but not all countries are catching up quite so fast.

entries.title: Exclusive: here’s your first look at the OnePlus Pad, launching alongside the OnePlus 11
entries.description: OnePlus has given us the first glimpse of the OnePlus Pad, in a stunning green shade.

entries.title: It looks like Samsung’s first 77-inch OLED TV will beat LG in one way: a high price
entries.description: The 77-inch Samsung S95C OLED has had its price leaked, and it'll cost more than LG's best 77-inch TV from 2022.

entries.title: Now it's IBM's turn to announce major job cuts
entries.description: IBM announcement will see 3,900 workers losing their jobs.

entries.title: The iPhone 15 Ultra could have better cameras and more power than the Pro
entries.description: Leaked iOS 17 code holds hints to what we might see in the iPhone 15 series.

entries.title: Microsoft just rolled out its most secure Microsoft 365 version yet
entries.description: With Office 365 Government Secret Cloud, Uncle Sam might be collecting your data, but at least he’s keeping it under lock and key.

entries.title: This official Samsung Galaxy S23 pre-order deal makes the phones more affordable
entries.description: Samsung has revealed that UK buyers will get a free storage upgrade if they pre-order a Galaxy S23, S23 Plus or S23 Ultra.

entries.title: HBO Max is stealthily removing The Dark Knight Trilogy soon
entries.description: HBO Max's superhero catalog is getting a major downgrade over the coming weeks.

entries.title: This new Python malware is going after Windows machines
entries.description: Dangerous malware is stealing data and logging keystrokes, and researchers still don't know who is behind it.

entries.title: The most spoofed company over the last few months is a major blast from the past
entries.description: Holiday season was lucrative for fraudsters sending out phishing emails, experts warn.

entries.title: The best Dolby Atmos Xbox Series X games: hear the difference
entries.description: Here's the best Dolby Atmos Xbox Series X games that take full advantage of the spatial audio technology.
